wikipedia_page.main: Kristian Callaghan (born 1 July 1993) is a British sport shooter. He competed for England in the 25 metre rapid fire pistol event at the 2014 Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze medal. He finished 4th in the 50 metre pistol event at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

response: *Kristian Callaghan, British pistol shooter, winner of Bronze Medal 2014 Commonwealth Games
